pageProduct.name: Pain Away Athelite Joint & Muscle Pain Relief Gel 185g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Joint & muscle pain relief gel

Warnings

External use only. Avoid contact with eyes & open wounds. If you have sensitive skin, test on a small area of skin before applying it to a large area. If irritation delvelops, discontinue use. 

Common Uses

Athelite's active ingredients are traditionally used in western herbal medicine for the relief of - symptons of mild arthritis, bruising, mild joint pain and inflammation, muscle sprains, strains & soreness. Providing support for your joints & muscles. 

Ingredients

Arnica Montana Flower Tincture, Caluendula Officinalis, Hypericum Perforatum, Menthol, Melaleuca Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, Cajuput Oil, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E 

Directions

Apply on and around the painful areas and rub in. Repeat up to 5 times daily. If symptoms persist , talk to your health professional.
